name: Ninjask
author: Sumiyoshi Kizuki
flavor_text: Because it moves so quickly, it sometimes becomes unseeable. It congregates around tree sap.

abilities.name: Wing Buzz
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, discard the top card of your opponent’s deck.

attacks.name: Afterimage Assault
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 Ninjask and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
